name: Amelia Across Worlds (A Hololive Fangame)
description:
Amelia Across Worlds is a procedurally generated minigame where you have to survive and not get caught by Mumei who is actively chasing you in a set world. Smol Ame must zoom past the guardian of civilization to win!

Disclaimer

This is a fangame and is not affiliated with Hololive nor does it represent Cover Corp. and other labels under the company. I do not own any ownership of any characters under the Hololive property. Support the V-Tubers and Amelia Watson of Hololive Myth which this game is based on! This application is completely free withs no form of monetization; I do not profit from this product. 

Credits: (Music and Models)

  • おもちゃのダンス @ フリーBGM DOVA-SYNDROME OFFICIAL YouTube CHANNEL - YouTube

Other Notes from the developer(?): 

  • This game was developed as a school project under my final high school programming class, this is bound to have to have bugs as I am not that well versed in programming and unity, but I took this chance to challenge myself and create something that I actually enjoy, welcome to my first ever game.  (tbh, I myself question the game title as well www)
  • You can follow me on Twitter (@PixelNayt), but I mostly do illustrations and animations.
  • Also note that I'm quite busy and kind of limited with game dev. knowledge therefore might not be able to resolve bugs that appear, apologies for the inconvenience~ qwq
  • More credits: All Smol Ame animations are also made by the amazing Seafoamboi, again, please go check them out!
  • Known Issues: 
    • Audio being low when changing scenes (resolve by clicking options every time you are in the main menu)* SFX doesn't do anything as there is no SFX in the game*
    • Mumei may or may not glitch out of the world when she is chasing you on extremely high mountains (slopes) This is a very rare occurrence but is still possible.
